title: Application of big data technology in business management
abstract: In the era of big data, data and information have become important resources. With a large amount of data and the ability to mine data and information, companies can occupy an important position in the market. In the face of the ever-changing economic and social environment, the existing business management system has many shortcomings. At present, most companies still use human-based business management systems, which have poor immediacy and high cost, and it is difficult to dig out potential information. In order to improve the existing business management system problems, it is necessary to use front-end information technology to build a more efficient business management big data analysis platform to enhance the core competitiveness of enterprises. The cloud computing-based business management big data analysis platform uses descriptive analysis, regular analysis and decision-making analysis methods to ensure university analysis of accounting big data and introduces a cloud computing security assurance framework into the security mechanism to ensure big data security and integrity.
